name: Kili's treasure
description:
A treasure hunt game where you interact with everything in Kili's house to help her find the treasure hidden by her mother.

Interact with nearly every item in the house.

Read the clues left by Mom carefully.

Relive the story of a girl and her best friend

Features

  • Explore six different rooms with over 45 different interactable objects each with their own significance.
  • Follow over 30 clues to find the treasure.
  • Experience a short and sweet story of a girl and her best friend.
